n = int(input())
p = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(1, n - 1):
    if p[i - 1] < p[i] < p[i + 1] or p[i + 1] < p[i] < p[i - 1]:
        count += 1





























































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































print(count)

# print(l)

print(s)

    if p[i - 1] < p[i] < p[i + 1] or p[i + 1] < p[i] < p[i - 1]:

n = int(input())
l = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

l2 = []
for i in range(n):
    if i == 0:
        l2.append(l[i])
    else:
        l2.append(l[i] + l2[i - 1])

print(l2)

n = int(input())
p = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(1, n-1):
    if p[i-1] < p[i] < p[i+1] or p[i+1] < p[i] < p[i-1]:
        count += 1
print(count)
